description: Search for and be recommended to a new job that you'll love.
h4_text_desktop_description: Manage all applications in one area
Save jobs for later viewing, share to colleagues or social media
All jobs posted are employer only
Easy CV upload, build or edit
View recommended jobs based on selected preferences
You will always receive a response to your application
Be visible to employers for invitations to apply for a position

description: Manage recruitment process all in one place
h4_text_desktop_description: Manage recruitment process all in one place
Direct applicants with full view CV and details
Customise your package to your needs
Collect your own candidate database and recommend other roles in your organisation.
Build job and personalise process (stages, questions etc.)
Get detailed information on how your applications are performing

description: No confusion who submitted candidates first
h4_text_desktop: Get invited to assist on a vacancy
h4_text_desktop_description: Advertise skills/ expertise to employers and candidates
No confusion who submitted candidates first
Submit your candidates directly to employers
Get weekly updates on your candidates progress
